abstract: "Hearing these words brought a hollow feeling deep within me."
description: Hiding from the Germans amongst olive trees in Greece, Arthur Bedford and his fellow soldiers were told to get out. "Every man for himself". Not only did they manage to escape, they managed to fend off a enemy bombing attack and didn't suffer a single casualty.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002722; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]; Active; 2011
